name: Tartle's Nihilism Boy
description:
Nihilism - [ˈnīəˌlizəm, ˈnēəˌlizəm] The definition doesn't even matter.

Go on an adventure as Nihilism Boy to rescue the princess. Or don't. It doesn't really matter either way.

  • Three levels of increasing pointlessness.
  • Two endings, each more meaningless than the last.

Honestly, it doesn't even matter. Nothing does.
